sqlMap.insert: insert into $tableUser$ls_mosms (dxid, yys, dlid, jsh, tdbh, jshm, jsnr, jsrq, jssj) values ($tableUser$sid_ls_mosms.nextval, (select kzbza from $tableUser$xt_nbcs where cslb = '1011' and csdm = substr(#jshm#, 0, 3)), (select dlid from $tableUser$xx_dl where zhm = #jsh#), #jsh#, #tdbh#, #jshm#, #jsnr#, #jsrq#, #jssj#)

insert into $tableUser$ls_mosms (dxid, yys, dlid, jsh, tdbh, jshm, jsnr, jsrq, jssj) values ($tableUser$sid_ls_mosms.nextval, (select kzbza from $tableUser$xt_nbcs where cslb = '1011' and csdm = substr(#jshm#, 0, 3)), #dlid#, #jsh#, #tdbh#, #jshm#, #jsnr#, #jsrq#, #jssj#)
